# Try the following at the R Console

### Examine the fileLayers variable

fileLayers

[1] "USA_adm1"
attr(,"driver")
[1] "ESRI Shapefile"
attr(,"nlayers")
[1] 1

The first attribute is the layer name we use to load the shape file
